ygData.subject: Re: Ice Crystal staff and Quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice Crystal Staff is no dropped by the preacher, he drops the runed circlet and the Cold Iron Mace Twister ... From: Reuben Aguilar  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Ice Crystal Staff is no dropped by the preacher, he drops the runed circlet
and the Cold Iron Mace
Twister
----- Original Message -----
From: Reuben Aguilar <reuben@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 3:28 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] Ice Crystal staff and Quest?


> From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
> Hi there,
>
> Im in permafrost and I have been hunting for the mob that has the Ice
> Crystal Staff. I was under the impression that it was the Preacher that
had
> it. But I can't seem to get it.. Anyone know if it is the preacher or is
it
> in another area ?
>
> Also, I read on everlore that the staffs are part of a quest. Somehow you
> can use the Water Crystal Staff and starts a long quest to get a great
mage
> useable one handed magic staff or something... Im curious if any of you
have
> any idea as to what it is ?
>
> Thanks
>
> Reuben
>
